body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos! My name is Ryan Bryant. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Ryan, my name is Cheryl Scott. I'm interested in learning more about the cars you have for sale.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Cheryl! We have a wide variety of cars available. Can I ask for your phone number so we can keep in touch regarding any updates or promotions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Cheryl. Could I also have your email address to send you some detailed information about our current offers and inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's cheryl.scott at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I've noted down your phone number and email address. Let me send you the details about our latest models and special promotions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds great, Ryan. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Cheryl. If you have any more questions or would like to schedule a test drive, feel free to contact me at any time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Cheryl. Have a wonderful day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ryan Bryant and the customer's name is Cheryl Scott.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
